landlordOne: Click the「List Icon」on top right corner to manage your property
landlordTwo: Click the「History Icon」to view your past payments, repairs, and expenses
propertyListOne: Click the「Plus Icon」to add your property
tenantOne: Click the「List Icon」on top right corner to check your lease
profileOne: Click the「Edit Icon」on top right corner to change Username and User ID
profileTwo: Click「Landlord」or「Tenant」under the Mode according to your needs to switch identities and confirm metrics in that mode.

landlordOne: Click the 3 bar on top right corner to add your property
landlordTwo: Click the「History Icon」to view your past payments, repairs, and expenses
propertyListOne: To add your Property, click on the plus Icon
tenantOne: Click the 3 bar on top right corner to see your lease
profileOne: Click the Pen Icon on top right corner to change or setup Username and ID
profileTwo:
Select Landlord or Tenant under Mode allows you to see different metrics on the Management tab.

Hint: Landlord mode allowed you to add tenant under your property

landlordOne: 點擊右上角「列表圖示」來管理您的房產
landlordTwo: Click the「History Icon」to view your past payments, repairs, and expenses
propertyListOne: 點擊「加號圖示」來增加您的房產
tenantOne: 點擊右上角「列表圖示」來確認您的租約
profileOne: 點擊右上角的「編輯圖示」來設定使用者名稱或更改使用者 ID
profileTwo: 依照您的需求點擊模式下的「房東」與「房客」來切換身分並確認該模式下的所有資訊
